Wendy Wasserstein

birth name: Wendy Wasserstein

born: 10/18/1950

died: 1/30/2006

View Reference Info

Biography

Playwright whose work probes, with humor and sensibility, the situation of college-educated women and their responses to their own aspirations and to the feminism of the late 1960s. Her drama The Heidi Chronicles (1989) was awarded both a Pulitzer Prize and an AntoinettePerry Award in 1989. Merriam-Webster's Encyclopedia of Literaturemore
